data.title: Simulation for Clinical Skills in Healthcare Education
data.meta_description: Patients are heavily reliant on healthcare providers being knowledgeable and highly competent in a broad range of skills underpinned by sound knowledge. Some of these skills can be very specific, while others are rather general and may apply in combination or in...
